name: Pivot (Marwhal)
description: Pivot is a small puzzle game in which you play as two squares connected by a bar. One square will remain in a fixed position while the other will rotate around it. By changing which square is fixed you can move around the levels and solve puzzles with square and button based solutions. Pivot was made by Marwhal in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam, in which the theme this year was "Joined Together."
